mapper.sql: SELECT d1.*, u1.*, u2.* FROM document d1 INNER JOIN user u1 ON d1.user_id = u1.id LEFT JOIN user u2 ON d1.sub_id = u2.id
mapper.select:
where d1.approval_status = 1 AND d1.publish_status = 1 AND d1.id IN (SELECT max(d3.id) FROM ( SELECT d5.id, d5.item_no, d5.material_no, d5.document_type, d5.sequence_no FROM document d5 INNER JOIN user u3 ON d5.user_id = u3.id LEFT JOIN user u4 ON d5.sub_id = u4.id WHERE d5.approval_status = 1 AND d5.publish_status = 1 ) d3 GROUP BY d3.item_no, d3.material_no, d3.document_type, d3.sequence_no )
and d1.item_no like CONCAT('%',#{itemNo}, '%')
and d1.document_type in
#{documentType}

where approval_status = 1 AND publish_status = 0 AND approval_time IS NOT NULL AND approval_time < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 12 HOUR) AND d1.id in ( select max(d2.id) from document d2 group by d2.item_no, d2.material_no, d2.document_type, d2.sequence_no )
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM document WHERE DATE(create_time) = DATE(#{date}) AND depart_id = #{departId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM document WHERE DATE(publish_time) = DATE(#{date}) AND depart_id = #{departId}
SELECT document_type as name, COUNT(*) as value FROM document GROUP BY document_type
